description.zh-cn: 中国京剧表演艺术家，一级演员，工小生。
description.en: A Chinese Peking Opera performing artist and first-class actor, specializing in 'xiaosheng' (young male) roles.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976, initiated and led by Mao Zedong.
A Chinese Peking Opera performing artist.
A Peking Opera troupe in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国京剧表演艺术家，叶少兰的父亲。
description.en: A Chinese Peking Opera performing artist, father of Ye Shaolan.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会
en: 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的第十一届全国委员会。
description.en: The 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会教科卫体委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会教科卫体委员会
en: Education, Science, Culture, Health and Sports Committee of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的下属专门委员会。
description.en: A special committee under the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 叶盛兰的妻子，叶少兰的母亲。
description.en: Wife of Ye Shenglan and mother of Ye Shaolan.

description.zh-cn: 京剧老生演员，叶少兰的哥哥。
description.en: A Peking Opera 'laosheng' (old male) role actor, older brother of Ye Shaolan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国授予专业文艺工作者的最高级别专业技术职称。
description.en: The highest professional title awarded to professional literary and art workers in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命结束后，叶少兰与杜近芳展开合作。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution ended, Ye Shaolan began to collaborate with Du Jinfang.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命结束后，叶少兰参加了战友京剧团。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution ended, Ye Shaolan joined the Zhanyou Peking Opera Troupe.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 2008年，当选第十一届全国政协委员。
description.en: In 2008, he was elected as a member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会教科卫体委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会教科文卫体委员会专委。
description.en: Served as a special committee member of the Education, Science, Culture, Health and Sports Committee of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 叶少兰是叶盛兰的小儿子。
description.en: Ye Shaolan is the youngest son of Ye Shenglan.

description.zh-cn: 叶少兰是刘淑卿的小儿子。
description.en: Ye Shaolan is the youngest son of Liu Shuqing.
Ye Shaolan is the younger brother of Ye Peng.

description.zh-cn: 叶少兰是中国一级演员。
description.en: Ye Shaolan is a Chinese first-class actor.
